text: Vahe'mofo mofavre Izikieliga, Tairi kumate ugagota kva nera Mikozama Kegavama Hu'nea Ra Anumzamo'a amanage hie hunka asamio, kagra kavufga ra nehunka nagra anumza mani'nena anumzantmimofo trate hageri amu'nompi mani'noe hunka kagesa antahi'nane. Hianagi kagra anumzana omani'nananki, kagra amne ama mopafi vahetfa mani'nane. Anumza mani'nena knare antahiza eri'noe hunka nehananagi anara osu'nane.
